熄.definition: to extinguish; to put out (fire); to quench; to stop burning; to go out (of fire, lamp etc); to come to an end; to wither away; to die out; Taiwan pr. [xi2]

熄滅.definition: to stop burning; to go out (of fire); to die out; extinguished

熄火.definition: (of fire, lamp etc) to go out; to put out (fire); (fig.) to die down; (of a vehicle) to stall

熄燈.definition: turn out the lights; lights out
